description: A Flutter widget called DateSelector that allows users to pick a date within a one-year range and displays the selected date formatted as 'EEE, MMM d, yyyy'. The widget uses showDatePicker to provide a date selection dialog and updates the displayed date when a new date is selected.

classes.name: DateSelector
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that encapsulates date picking functionality with customizable initial value and onChanged callback.

methods.name: _pick
methods.description: Asynchronously shows a date picker dialog allowing the user to select a date within a one-year range from today.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget UI, displaying the currently selected date and handling tap to invoke the date picker.
